entry.source: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,105}{F813,1,403442}Just when I thought Kenji's rule was{F801}over, this Akira guy comes and takes{F801}over Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}Well, no matter who becomes King of{F801}Tokyo, I'll welcome him.{F801}{F802}...It doesn't change the fact that{F801}my brains are being sucked out...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,105}{F813,1,403442}Just when I thought Kenji's rule was{F801}over, this Akira guy comes and takes{F801}over Ikebukuro?{F801}{F802}Well, no matter who becomes King of{F801}Tokyo, I'll welcome him.{F801}{F802}...It doesn't change the fact that{F801}my brains are being sucked out...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,108}{F813,1,403503}Long ago, Ikebukuro was controlled{F801}by foreign demons. It was terrible...{F801}{F802}They didn't have neurishers back{F801}then... The demons would just eat{F801}people whole, whenever they wanted.{F801}{F802}The old King of Tokyo, Kenji, defeated{F801}the leader of those foreign demons.{F801}{F802}People might say a lot of other{F801}things about him, but in a way,{F801}Kenji was our savior.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Neurisher\0{F87A,108}{F813,1,403503}Long ago, Ikebukuro was controlled{F801}by foreign demons. It was terrible...{F801}{F802}They didn't have neurishers back{F801}then... The demons would just eat{F801}people whole, whenever they wanted.{F801}{F802}The old King of Tokyo, Kenji, defeated{F801}the leader of those foreign demons.{F801}{F802}People might say a lot of other{F801}things about him, but in a way,{F801}Kenji was our savior.{F801}
